title: Body Terrain Handbooks - CancerChoices
cleaned_text: We're developing handbooks on these further body terrain factors linked to cancer: - Bleeding and coagulation imbalance - Hormone imbalance - Immune function - Inflammation - Oxidation Directly explore our many free cancer care resources. See our reviews of therapies that your doctor may not mention, or investigate handbooks with guidance on key topics. These reviews summarize the medical benefits, safety and cost of complementary therapies. Complementary therapies may be used along with conventional treatments such as chemotherapy or surgery. Many can help you manage side effects of conventional treatments and promote wellness. Some may enhance the effects of conventional treatments. A collection of handbooks on using an integrative approach for specific cancer types, with different treatments, or depending on where you are in your cancer experience.
